0P00005UWA.BO.long_name: Tata Income Fund Regular Income Option Half Yearly Dividend Payout
0P00005UWA.BO.summary: The investment objective of the Scheme is to provide income distribution/capital appreciation over medium to long term.

0P0000XV5N.BO.long_name: Kotak Bond Quaterly Dividend Payout Direct
0P0000XV5N.BO.summary:
The investment objective of the Scheme is to create a portfolio
of debt instruments such as bonds, debentures, Government
Securities and money market instruments, including repos in
permitted securities of different maturities, so as to spread the
risk across different kinds of issuers in the debt markets.
There is no assurance that the investment objective of the
Scheme will be achieved.
0P0000XV5N.BO.family: Kotak Mahindra Asset Management Co Ltd

0P00015411.BO.short_name: HDFC Income Fund Regular Plan N
0P00015411.BO.long_name: HDFC Income Fund Regular Plan Normal Dividend Payout Option
0P00015411.BO.summary: To generate income / capital appreciation through investments in debt and money market instruments. There is no assurance that the investment objective of the Scheme will be realized.
